original_text:
Why did you sit still among the sheepfolds,
    to hear the whistling for the flocks?
Among the clans of Reuben
    there were great searchings of heart.
korean_text: 네가 양의 우리 가운데에 앉아서 목자의 피리 부는 소리를 들음은 어찌 됨이냐 르우벤 시냇가에서 큰 결심이 있었도다

sentences.original_text: Why did you sit still among the sheepfolds
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 어찌하여 양 우리 가운데 가만히 앉아 있었느냐

sentences.original_text: to hear the whistling for the flocks?
sentences.korean_translation: 양 떼를 위한 휘파람 소리를 듣기 위하여?

sentences.original_text: there were great searchings of heart.
